mapper.select: SELECT SUM(alls.total)AS total FROM (select sums as total, c.customer_name, cash.remarks FROM cash_trade cash, customer c WHERE cash.customer_id = c.customer_id AND typelist ='매출' union all SELECT sums AS total, c.customer_name, note.remarks FROM note_ledger note, customer c WHERE note.customer_id = c.customer_id AND state = '지급' AND typelist ='받는어음')alls
SELECT SUM(maxsal.sal)AS sal FROM (SELECT RPAD(TRUNC(E_SAL/12),7, '0')AS sal FROM EMPLOYEE)maxsal
SELECT (COUNT(emp_id)*100000)AS transportation FROM employee WHERE dept_id='dept_id_01'
SELECT sum(premium.sal*0.1)as premium FROM( SELECT RPAD(TRUNC(E_SAL/12),7, '0')AS sal FROM EMPLOYEE)premium
SELECT SUM(total)as costtotal FROM (SELECT (p.price_in * b.buy_amount)AS total FROM buy b, product p WHERE b.product_id = p.product_id)
